# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is highly valued by many of our customers. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I am offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $150, which is a special discount considering your potential long-term business with us. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the benefits of our product at an attractive rate. Let me know if you have any questions or need further information. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
